languages.text: Таинственный союзник Лорд-капитана, изъясняющийся загадками, посоветовал е{mf|му|й} отыскать некоего "дирижера плоти", для которого "мускул лишь инструмент". Якобы эта загадочная личность может подарить Вольному Торговцу надежду на спасение... Хотя нельзя точно быть уверенн{mf|ым|ой}, что имел ввиду этот странный советчик.

The Lord Captain's enigmatic ally, who prefers to speak in riddles, has advised {mf|him|her} to search for a "maestro" of a "haggard chorus" whose "flesh is employed to serve his art." It seems that this mysterious person might provide the Rogue Trader with the means to escape the Dark City... Though it is hard to decipher the exact meaning behind the bizarre stranger's words.
languages.original_text: Таинственный союзник Лорд-капитана, изъясняющийся загадками, посоветовал е{mf|му|й} отыскать некоего "дирижера плоти", для которого "мускул лишь инструмент". Якобы эта загадочная личность может подарить Вольному Торговцу надежду на спасение... Хотя нельзя точно быть уверенн{mf|ым|ой}, что имел ввиду этот странный советчик.

The Lord Captain's enigmatic ally, who prefers to speak in riddles, has advised {mf|him|her} to search for a "maestro" of a "haggard chorus" whose "flesh is employed to serve his art." It seems that this mysterious person might provide the Rogue Trader with the means to escape the Dark City... Though it is hard to decipher the exact meaning behind the bizarre stranger's words.

languages.text: L'énigmatique allié {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} lui a conseillé de chercher le « maestro » d'un « chœur exténué » dont la « chair l'aide à exprimer son art ». Il semblerait que cette mystérieuse personne puisse l'aider à s'échapper de la Cité Crépusculaire, mais il est bien difficile de déchiffrer le sens exact des paroles de l'étrange individu.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's enigmatic ally, who prefers to speak in riddles, has advised {mf|him|her} to search for a "maestro" of a "haggard chorus" whose "flesh is employed to serve his art." It seems that this mysterious person might provide the Rogue Trader with the means to escape the Dark City... Though it is hard to decipher the exact meaning behind the bizarre stranger's words.

traits.locale_text: L'énigmatique allié {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} lui a conseillé de chercher le « maestro » d'un « chœur exténué » dont la « chair l'aide à exprimer son art ». Il semblerait que cette mystérieuse personne puisse l'aider à s'échapper de la Cité Crépusculaire, mais il est bien difficile de déchiffrer le sens exact des paroles de l'étrange individu.

languages.text: 行商浪人的神秘盟友，某个喜欢用谜语来说话的古怪异形，建议{mf|他|她}去找他去寻找某个指挥“憔悴合唱”的“大师”，这个人正在努力“完成经典之作”。看来，这个神秘人或许会帮助行商浪人逃出黑暗之城……不过，那位古怪的引路人指的究竟是什么，恐怕没有人能完全理解。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's enigmatic ally, who prefers to speak in riddles, has advised {mf|him|her} to search for a "maestro" of a "haggard chorus" whose "flesh is employed to serve his art." It seems that this mysterious person might provide the Rogue Trader with the means to escape the Dark City... Though it is hard to decipher the exact meaning behind the bizarre stranger's words.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的神秘盟友，某个喜欢用谜语来说话的古怪异形，建议{mf|他|她}去找他去寻找某个指挥“憔悴合唱”的“大师”，这个人正在努力“完成经典之作”。看来，这个神秘人或许会帮助行商浪人逃出黑暗之城……不过，那位古怪的引路人指的究竟是什么，恐怕没有人能完全理解。

languages.text: 謎めいた言葉を好むロード・キャプテンの盟友は、『芸術の小道具として肉体を使う』、『聞くに堪えない合唱』を操る『音楽家』を探すよう助言した。この謎多き人物が、自由開拓者が仄暗き都を脱出するための手段を提供してくれるかもしれない…とはいえ、その奇妙な素性の分からぬ男が発する言葉の裏に隠された正確な意味を読み解くのは難しい。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's enigmatic ally, who prefers to speak in riddles, has advised {mf|him|her} to search for a "maestro" of a "haggard chorus" whose "flesh is employed to serve his art." It seems that this mysterious person might provide the Rogue Trader with the means to escape the Dark City... Though it is hard to decipher the exact meaning behind the bizarre stranger's words.

traits.locale_text: 謎めいた言葉を好むロード・キャプテンの盟友は、『芸術の小道具として肉体を使う』、『聞くに堪えない合唱』を操る『音楽家』を探すよう助言した。この謎多き人物が、自由開拓者が仄暗き都を脱出するための手段を提供してくれるかもしれない…とはいえ、その奇妙な素性の分からぬ男が発する言葉の裏に隠された正確な意味を読み解くのは難しい。

languages.text: Der rätselhafte Verbündete des Lord Captains, der nur in Rätseln spricht, hat ihm geraten, nach einem "Maestro" eines "hageren Chors" zu suchen, dessen "Fleisch allein seiner Kunst dient". Offenbar kann diese mysteriöse Person {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} einen Weg zeigen, aus der Dunklen Stadt zu entkommen ... Wobei sich die Worte des bizarren Fremden nur sehr schwer deuten lassen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's enigmatic ally, who prefers to speak in riddles, has advised {mf|him|her} to search for a "maestro" of a "haggard chorus" whose "flesh is employed to serve his art." It seems that this mysterious person might provide the Rogue Trader with the means to escape the Dark City... Though it is hard to decipher the exact meaning behind the bizarre stranger's words.

traits.locale_text: Der rätselhafte Verbündete des Lord Captains, der nur in Rätseln spricht, hat ihm geraten, nach einem "Maestro" eines "hageren Chors" zu suchen, dessen "Fleisch allein seiner Kunst dient". Offenbar kann diese mysteriöse Person {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} einen Weg zeigen, aus der Dunklen Stadt zu entkommen ... Wobei sich die Worte des bizarren Fremden nur sehr schwer deuten lassen.

languages.text: El enigmático aliado de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, que prefiere comunicarse mediante acertijos, le ha aconsejado que busque al «maestro» de un «coro demacrado» que «usa su carne como lienzo». Parece que esta misteriosa persona podría proporcionar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente los medios necesarios para escapar de la Ciudad Siniestra..., aunque descifrar las palabras del misterioso forastero sea una tarea complicada.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's enigmatic ally, who prefers to speak in riddles, has advised {mf|him|her} to search for a "maestro" of a "haggard chorus" whose "flesh is employed to serve his art." It seems that this mysterious person might provide the Rogue Trader with the means to escape the Dark City... Though it is hard to decipher the exact meaning behind the bizarre stranger's words.

traits.locale_text: El enigmático aliado de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, que prefiere comunicarse mediante acertijos, le ha aconsejado que busque al «maestro» de un «coro demacrado» que «usa su carne como lienzo». Parece que esta misteriosa persona podría proporcionar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente los medios necesarios para escapar de la Ciudad Siniestra..., aunque descifrar las palabras del misterioso forastero sea una tarea complicada.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın bilmecelerle konuşmayı tercih eden gizemli müttefiki, ona "bedenleri onun sanatında hizmete koyulan, bezgin bir koronun maestrosunu" aramasını tavsiye etti. Bu gizemli kişi, Hür Tacir'e Kara Şehir'den kaçmanın yollarını gösterebilirmiş. Fakat ilginç yabancının sözlerinin ardındaki anlamı tam olarak çıkarmak oldukça zor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's enigmatic ally, who prefers to speak in riddles, has advised {mf|him|her} to search for a "maestro" of a "haggard chorus" whose "flesh is employed to serve his art."
